item.title: Traveling Sales Person using Genetic Algorithms
item.description: This post is best viewed using the light theme. This post uses GA to generate a high-quality solution to the Traveling Salesman Problem. Traveling Salesman Problem using Genetic Algorithm This blog post is regarding using a genetic algorithm to solve the Traveling Salesman Problem. In a one-liner, the TSP asks the following question: Given a list of cities and the distances between each pair of the cities, what is the shortest possible route that visits each city and returns to the origin city?
